titleStmt.title: The Army's plea for their present practice: tendered to the consideration of all ingenuous and impartial men. Printed and published by special command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to the Army, dwelling in Aldersgate Street next door to the Peacock.,
